body: Flipping source and target in my example also results in a failure, not sure why I couldn't reproduce this earlier. I have edited the issue description accordingly.

issue.title: Add support for bind mounts under `/tmp` with hermetic tmp

issue.body:
This is achieved by rewriting the user-specified mounts to mounts onto subdirectories of the hermetic sandbox tmp directory.

Fixes #20527
